about_the_game:
Enmity: Warfare is a modern-era multiplayer shooter game that provides realistic and immersive combined arms experience where players shape the outcome of a persistent large-scale war.

Please note that this is an early access project. These paragraphs are for all intents and purposes; our vision for the game. All game mechanics and game assets are currently under development and may be subject to change in the future.

Game Setting Information

Enmity: Warfare features a persistent large-scale open world map where each player has an influence and can contribute to the war outcome by utilizing combat, engineering and logistics.

All the equipment, weapons and ammunition are produced and delivered by players; Each vehicle, combat vehicle and structures are also constructed by players, require technology, cost resources and run out in time; requiring players to frequently resupply Factories (FTs), Forward Operating Bases (FOBs), Bunker Operating Bases (BoBs) and Town Halls (THs) throughout the conquest duration.

Enmity: Warfare Environment & War

From the Rocky Mountains, Sand Dunes, Swamps and Oceans to an impressive vast open world is available for your exploration. Explore the environment by Land, Water or Air. Get in challenging situations and find a way out of them.
In pursuit of victory, you are free to choose your way. Get things done unnoticed or take the chance and go all in. Demolish and rebuild Victory Points (VPs), Destroy Enemy Infrastructure, Meet fellow soldiers and organize. Take the Lead and communicate to bring victory to your Faction.

Enmity: Warfare Factions

Join either of two formidable factions: The Coalition Force (TCF) or The Insurgent Syndicate (TIS) and swear allegiance to. Each faction has a specific researchable system, equipment, weapons, vehicles, combat vehicles and is balanced to counter the opposing faction.

Enmity: Integration Positional Voip Communication

Communication is a soldier's most valuable tool. To help facilitate navigating the complexity of communication on the battlefield, Enmity: Warfare provides a sophisticated Positional VOIP Communication System removing the need for third-party programs and allowing players to talk to other players locally, in-squad and between squad leaders.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-6100 / Core™ i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 or AMD Radeon™ RX 470 - DirectX 12.0 compatible system
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 125 GB available space
